Passionate.Curious: Loves to learn, genuinely interested seeks details
Passionate.Engaged: Pays attention, active listener, follows customer lead
Passionate.Inquisitive: Interested, inclined to ask questions and find answers
Passionate.Enthusiastic: Boundless Energy and infectious excitement, loves to succeed

Determined.Time Management: Can follow a schedule and task oriented

Team Player.Collaborative: Enjoys working with others and takes input from others
Team Player.Rally: Can motivate and energize others to work together
Team Player.Compromise: Can compromise and accept other opinions and drive
